website_summaries.verdict: These softgels provide some of the highest amounts of omega-3 fatty acids of any other fish oil supplement on the market with no fishy aftertaste.
pros: In each dose you get 2,250 mg of omega-3 fatty acids, which includes 1,200 mg of EPA and 900 mg DHA
The fish oil is sourced from wild-caught fish, so you know it's high quality
Also, in addition to no fishy smell, aftertaste, or burps, they have a pleasant lemon smell
cons: You pay for quality for these fish oil supplements — they're some of the most expensive on the market
The daily dose is 3 softgels per day, which is higher than some other brands

customer_reviews.title: I love these ARAZO Omega 3 Fish Oil softgels!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these ARAZO Omega 3 Fish Oil softgels! They were easy to swallow and had no after taste at all!! The best part were they really seemed to help my dry eyes and I love that they are made and formulated in the USA!! Thank you and I will be buying these again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Norton

customer_reviews.title: This Product Will Change Your Life
customer_reviews.text: Can't enough good things about this product. Has helped in so many ways. I used to suffer from mood swings. Not anymore. My blood pressure is better. My joints are more flexible.. This all happened about two days after starting to take this product and now I won't live without it.. Worth a thousand dollars a bottle!!~!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Long

customer_reviews.title: Take daily.
customer_reviews.text: I take this supplement to strengthen my oral lining and improve joint movement. It works for me. I will buy more of this brand in the future also for other reason - I am not allergic to it and there is no after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Melendez

customer_reviews.title: A Godsend!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is a real review. My name is Justin and I live in Jacksonville, Florida. I wasn’t paid to write this. I’ve struggled with anxiety/depression for about 2 years. I’m on my third SSRI now (Viibyrd) and have really only had some relief from it. I’ve been taking this brand of omega 3 for some time now at the recommended dose of 3 a day. I just started taking 6 a day (split between morning and afternoon) and the effects were immediate upon taking the second half of the dose the first day. Please try this if you have the same issues. I also take a low dose of 5-HTP, magnesium, and vitamin B-6. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cartee

customer_reviews.title: Helps with joint pain and dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! No fish burps or yucky aftertaste. I was suffering from very dry eyes when my Dr recommended that I start taking fish oil. Other brands didn't help, but Omega 3 has made a great difference! I'm no longer having to use dry eye drops all the time. It's also helped with joint pain that I have from arthritis in my knees and back problems. I plan on taking this every day!
customer_reviews.author: stephlvsbooks

customer_reviews.title: Has helped me tremendously
customer_reviews.text: Great product, before I started using this fish oil my cholesterol was extremely high after a short five months of being on this and being retested my cholesterol has lowered nearly 50 points I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: marcus alan abadie

customer_reviews.title: BEST Fish Oil Supplement EVER!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these fish oil gel capsules! I will never buy another brand but THIS one! They don’t taste like fish oil so it does not leave a fishy taste in your mouth and it WORKS for my dry eyes (as suggested by my ophthalmologist). I noticed the difference in just a matter of days after taking this and my eyes produce more natural tears with this! I’m a Happy and Completely Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.author: NMP9486

customer_reviews.title: The best fish oil!
customer_reviews.text: Great fish oil. Easy to take and I've felt so much better since adding these to my stack. A big improvement from the flaxseed Omega 3 oil I was taking previously... 10/10 will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: -=M=-

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Last year I started going to a Integrative Doctor and he recommended I take Omega 3. This brand was the only Omega 3 product that had the right nutritional make-up. The doctor recommended 1200 mg of EPA and and 900 mg DHA. This product has significantly improved my health! For what it provides it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: We had doctor check up today and eye is perfect. She will be taking after Surgery for 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my wife. She had lasic and required to take high dosage of Omega 3 such as 2000MG/day. Started 2 weeks before the surgery and today is just one month passed. We had doctor check up today and eye is perfect. She will be taking after Surgery for 6 month. Price is very reasonable and effective. Doctor recommended one is double price.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Stuck together.
customer_reviews.text: Product was stuck together when I got it. Made the mistake or reading the review on here that if you stuck the bottle in the freezer the pills would come apart. Well I tried giving the frozen pills a good whack and the bottle broke, and fish oil splattered all over my kitchen. Fun fact: fish oil will eat the paint off you kitchen cupboards.....
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sievers

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the cost, but buy one bottle a the time.
customer_reviews.text: The product has a very high concentrate of EPA and DHA. The price is good also. However, i bought 5 bottles and 2 of them had must have gotten too hot by the supplier as the capsules melted together and when i try to get then apart they bust and oil gets on everything. I kept them in the fridge as my doctor recommended. I bought 5 bottles before this last 5, and didn't have any trouble from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackofalldave

customer_reviews.title: Great fish oil
customer_reviews.text: Great fish oil! Easy to swallow pills, no fishy aftertaste and high grade supplement. I have recommended these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Banana

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I decided to give it a try. About a week of taking one softgel a day I notice my pain in left knee went away. The pain I had was so sharp that it bother me as I ran or sat down (driving) or had my leg at 90 degree angle that I had to keep my leg stretched to relief some of the pain. This softgels have done the work for me, know I can run my half Marathon's or have my leg 90 degree w/o any pain. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Very Misleading!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product due to the high amount of EPA and DHA and saw that it was 120capsules which is awesome. Only later when it arrived it says that you need to take 3capsules to get the advertised DHA and EPA mg. very misleading and dishonest.
customer_reviews.author: JBL

customer_reviews.title: Bad headaches.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the nutrigold triple strength, but came across this for a little bit cheaper price and it sounded pretty good so the label says. This fish oil gives me terrible headaches and I have tried it a few times now and within a few hrs I get a headache. This never happened with the nutragold. I’m going to guess this fish oil containes higher levels of heavy metals compared to nutragold. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for quite a while and to be honest it works stunningly. I do understand it actually is pretty hard to asses how the supplement work in conjunction with other supplements and fairly healthy diet, but what I actually feel is that my skin got better and most important I feel less stomach irritation. So likely it's due to omega'a 3 natural anti inflammatory effect. I take 2 caps with my breakfast + with my afternoon meal.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Architect

customer_reviews.title: Arazo false Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, however very disappointing getting a post card from Arazon about getting a free bonus bottle by following three easy steps and never getting the free bottle. Left several emails with no response which causes me to question products as well. Looking to switching to another brand because of their lack of follow up. See picture for the post card, don't waste your time if you receive it, they will not follow up with commitment.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love that this omega 3 fish oil has a high quality of Omega 3 Fish Oil 2250mg | HIGH EPA 1200MG + DHA 900MG Triple Strength Burpless Capsules. I quit using it for awhile and my hair became dry and brittle. I have an autoimmune disease and this omega 3 helps keep my joints, skin and eyes lubricated. Another of my favorite qualities is that it gives my brain and heart a healthy boost every morning. Thank you BioScience Nutrition!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gayl Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fish Oil product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product regularly usually weekdays along with a multivitamin which I have been taking for much longer. With the added fish oil I see a high elevation in my energy levels and just overall a "clearer" mind and body. I take 3 of them after my lunch meal and they are easy to swallow and don't have any sort of taste or aftertaste. This product is great and especially for the price. Would highly recommend for anyone just starting to take fish oil or someone who currently takes fish oil. I have no complaints about this product. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Flores

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this product. Upon recieving it multiple pills were broken and the majority of the rest were stuck together. I’ve ordered fish oil online before and never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: USP testing needed
customer_reviews.text: I am using this request for a product review to advocate that consumers only by supplements with a USP logo on the label. This certifies that the ingredients listed on the label are indeed in the product. I am a retired scientist and was concerned that the supplements my physician recommended are not required to have quality testing to the same rigor as drugs. While USP testing is voluntary it provides an important safeguard.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA?
customer_reviews.text: Arazo's Amazon product page claims it's made in the USA but it only has "Formulated in the USA" on the bottle. Meaning the formula was made by US scientists and then the actual manufacturing was done overseas. Mostly likely China or some other Asian country so you don't really know what's going into these pills. Another clue that this is not made in the USA is that it has "Manufactured for Arazo..." on the bottle but doesn't state where. Deceptive. Don't understand how this isn't considered fraud. Perhaps because of wording?
customer_reviews.author: Joe the Ragman

customer_reviews.title: Does not give results
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in order to help my cholesterol and perhaps it would help my memory and it did nothing. Several months later I went back to my doctors and my cholesterol hasn't changed, and I didn't feel any better. Unfortunately, I didn't realize that I purchased it on auto renewal. It's waiting to be shipped now and unfortunately it's too late to cancel, but I thought I would tell others that it is worthless. :(
customer_reviews.author: Steven Walker

customer_reviews.title: High quality or not?
customer_reviews.text: To my understanding, the quality of Omega 3 Fish Oil is very important. There is a website that tells you whether a particular fish oil meets the standards to be qualified as a "high quality." Unfortunately, this product is not included in that website, so it is difficult to determine the quality. However, I received requests to leave reviews on Amazon to receive a free bottle of this product. As soon as I receive such requests, I will return or throw out the product, because this tells me that the reviews are biased.
customer_reviews.author: Shahin

customer_reviews.title: I find it amazing that they advertise on the front Triple Strength with ...
customer_reviews.text: I find it amazing that they advertise on the front Triple Strength with 1200 mg of EPA. Yes it is if you take three capsules. I should have known to look at the dosage which is my bad. Sam's offers a triple strength with 647 mg in 1 capsule. Will not order again. Update: the company has refunded my purchase price and has been most accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: Buddys Pal

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy Pills
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a while now and i love it, but today it arrived cloudy. The shiny ones on the bottom are what I am used to and from my old bottle. Update- Was contacted by customer service informing me that the cloudy version was an update for the hot summer months to prevent them from sticking together. I do prefer the clear look..
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Arazo Omega 3 Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality omega 3 oil filled with top quality ingredients. This product does not give you the burps with the terrible fish oil breath and smell that I have experienced with other fish oil products! Even more importantly, It works! With the quality ingredients in this fish oil paired with the affordable price, this is now my go to fish oil product! Great Product and Great Customer Service!!!!! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Robert Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Indeed, burpless. Very pleased with purchase. I compare quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I am an extreme quality and price comparison shopper. i.e., I think I waste way too much time looking for a better product with the best price deal before making a purchase. My eye doctor is always pushing his expensive fish oil which is similar in high dosage to this Omega 3 Fish Oil from Arazo Nutrition. Definitely burpless. I HATE fish anything so that matters to me. I will definitely purchase this item again and I would consider their other products now as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jayjay

customer_reviews.title: Not burpless!
customer_reviews.text: ***Update** The company read my review and gave me a refund and offered me to try another one of their products. I did not expect this and truly appreciated how well they have stood by their product. ***Not burpless. I had to start taking them at night because I couldn't stand burping up fish oil during the day. After I finish with this bottle I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sjames

customer_reviews.title: Burped taste like fish!
customer_reviews.text: I would give it half a star if I could! First pill was fine on first day but on the 2nd I took one after breakfast and burped and the fish Smell made me puke twice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Siebrecht

customer_reviews.title: Beware proper "dose" is 3 pills
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my younger brother because his pediatrician said that Omega 3 can help with ADHD. I started giving him 3 at night with dinner but he got tired of swallowing three pills that were so large at once so I now give him one with breakfast and one with dinner. He doesn't complain about the fishy burps that you sometimes get with Omega 3 oils and he has said it helps him feel less sore after ice hockey workouts/games. My only complaint about these is that you need 3 pills for the proper dose which means you go through the bottle quickly and it's not fun getting a moody teenager to take 3 of these at once.
customer_reviews.author: KLuv

customer_reviews.title: Every pill was stuck together in a giant clump!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every pill was stuck together in a giant clump!!! Safety seal was intact. I could not even pry one pill from the rock hard mass.. Never again. Sorry I will buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Lowered my cholesterol and triglycerides
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had extremely high triglycerides for years and nothing has helped. After two months of taking these, my levels dropped 50 points. Very happy with the results so far. Only complaint is that the capsules were melted and stuck together in my last bottle and it seems to be a common problem. They offer a free replacement, but it’s still inconvenient and I’ve never had this problem with any other brand I’ve used over the last 10 years. Other than that, it’s a decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Helps My Depression
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from depression for years, and I have tried a lot of different approaches for it. I noticed I always felt better when I consumed foods w Omega-3’s, and when I learned these can help fight depression I figured what could it hurt. I could only get more healthy. After taking this product I have noticed an improvement in not only my depression, but also in my activity levels. The pills are pretty large and it is advisable to take one at a time, but that’s never been an issue for me. No fish burps from this either. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brody H

customer_reviews.title: Potent !
customer_reviews.text: Potent ! After taking it for a week i broke out with immense itching. I ended up seeing a doctor and then realized that this was something new I was taking and could have been causing the itch. I discontinued it for a wrek and when I started taking it again the itch came back. I tried and teated this product a few times and everytime it gave me a bad it h all over my body worst under my feet and arms. I did some research and some other people had complained of the same problem. So be careful with this product.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to supplements you have to trust the company that produces them. The specs on this product are very good which is why I have used this for a few years on auto refill monthly. The benefits of Omega 3 Fish Oil are known for maintaining heart health and more, and this product has worked good for me. I guess if I live until I'm 100 years old I can give you a more accurate review of the benefit, but based on the specs this is a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great cost
customer_reviews.text: I love that these contain the highest doses of EPA and DHA I could find at a great cost. (There are two of us taking them)
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Stuck together -- Revised review
customer_reviews.text: The capsules were all stuck together in the jar in an inseparable mass. Almost impossible to break them apart without piercing/breaking one of them. Not sure if they sat in a hot warehouse or what happened but I'll likely only salvage 6 or 8 capsules out of 120. Modified to 4 stars because I did not notice their offer for a free bottle if they are stuck together. I emailed them the required information and within minutes their customer service folks contacted me. Nice save by them!
customer_reviews.author: PAHunter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended and endorsed!
customer_reviews.text: I love the high dose of EPA and DHA and there is no fishy burping either. Great for mental focus and clarity as well as anti-inflammation for my joints. Also, when you have optimal Omega 3 consumption it assists in reducing body fat too. I'm a personal trainer too and highly endorsed this to friends and clients.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Eagle Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time ordering this brand. I’ve always used LifeExtentions. I must say it took me close to 18 months to bring down my cholesterol and triglycerides. I’ve been taking this brand since September 10 and boy can I tell the difference. Just had labs done on October 21 and finally I am in normal ranges for cholesterol and triglycerides. I also have this brand on subscribe and save now. Getting my next bottle November 25th. I’m very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald ice 55

customer_reviews.title: Higher nutritional values than most competitors
customer_reviews.text: I have taken various omegas and fish oils for years for health and its anti-inflammatory benefits. After an initial review of this product I was impressed with the amount per serving of the different supplements. It is 2-3 times more than the NatureMade brand I have been recently buying from Costco. After taking it for a few weeks, I have noticed a difference in my skin and hair. It is hard to gauge overall health without blood tests, but I also feel better on the inside. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good anti-inflammatory and good overall health!
customer_reviews.author: JK2000

customer_reviews.title: 3 capsules to equal the same as 1 capsule with other brands
customer_reviews.text: Went back to Natures Bounty. 40 capsules for $8.57 and 1 capsule per day
customer_reviews.author: PeterDCox

customer_reviews.title: The best fish oil product I have tried
customer_reviews.text: The best fish oil product I have tried! You really see the difference in your skin, hair and joint health. Will be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Olena

customer_reviews.title: It really worded for my funk..
customer_reviews.text: I was on some heavy medication for about 1 year or so... When I got off the meds, I went to withdrawals and got some minor depression. My Dr. recommended me take high pure Omega 3 with to help. Sure enough about 1 week or so. I noticed I was feeling in a better mood & less depressed. This was about 6 month ago and I'm still taking the same brands. Trust me, I tried 2 other companies but noticed a different... I highly recommend and giving them a chance..
customer_reviews.author: AMRod24

customer_reviews.title: I read fish oil is good for joints but really didn’t expect this result
customer_reviews.text: Been taking these fish oils for about a month now. I take before bed every night. I have or should say HAD joint pain in my shoulders from training. Haven’t noticed any pain after the first couple of days of taking. I read fish oil is good for joints but really didn’t expect this result. Will definitely continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Best Omega 3s I have found
customer_reviews.text: I have Lupus. So I live with pain and inflammation. Fish oil really helps along with other herbs and CBC oil. But I feel way worse when not taking fish oil too. This is the best I have ever tried for over all pain relief and helps lower my triglycerides. Best of all the ONLY fish oil that gives no after taste or fish burps 😊. The only downside is dosage, need to take 3 capsules to reach the goal. Which leaves us to 40 days worth of supply per pack
customer_reviews.author: paragp

customer_reviews.title: Lowered my triglycerides
customer_reviews.text: Only after taking a month as directed it significantly reduced my triglycerides to optimum levels. I was prescribed a prescription fish oil that was denied by my insurance. After doing some research I settled on this product and it has been great. No fishy smell or burps, I take it once a day after I eat typically breakfast but sometimes after lunch. Just ordered my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Do your body a favor and take omega 3 fish oil
customer_reviews.text: This is why I buy Omega 3 fish oil instead of Walmart or any other stores fish oil, The quality is top notch and best of all amazon sends it right to my door. ( 60 miles from town ). If you want to save a little do like me get on auto order , it keeps you from running out and saves $$$. If you have a problem swallowing pills blend them in a smoothie and you will never know they were there!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Appearance of product in capsule changed
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product multiple times and the capsules have always been clear. This time they were foggy / cloudy inside. I looked for a notice that things had changed but found none. I returned the product to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Robb

customer_reviews.title: No dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping for some good Omega 3 pills I could take that wouldn't give me nasty burps and would help hydrate my eyes. Well I found them these things are the best on the market and they have worked time after time. I had Lasic surgery done many years ago and so many times I woke up with dry eyes, not any more these pills have worked plus omega 3 fish pills that's a plus because these are important to take.
customer_reviews.author: M. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Not all Omega 3 supplements are created equal
customer_reviews.text: You have to check EPA and DHA content and make sure it comes from wild caught fish. Once I learned that, I sadly had to ditch my old batch and found Arazo. I wish I knew the above before so I wouldn't had wasted money. Either way, passing on my experience. These OMEGA3 caps are great, and the pricing isn't as high as it used to be. Stay healthy, my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Pura Vida

customer_reviews.title: 100% accurate title and claims
customer_reviews.text: I like the high potency so I'm not having to take multiple gel capsules. It says burpless and that's 100% accurate. I've taken other brands and experienced the fishy burp. I finished a complete bottle with zero fishy burps :) Good quality. I've purchased several other supplements from this brand and happy with all.
customer_reviews.author: Product development engineer

customer_reviews.title: Easily Digestible Fish Oil Capsules
customer_reviews.text: These Arazo Omega 3 Fish Oil capsules are excellent because they cause no fishy burping, no gas, no upset stomach and no fishy breath! These are the first ones that have agreed with my digestion. I will certainly be buying these again. They are a little larger but they are very easy to swallow. Fish oil is excellent for Omega 3 To support brain and heart health, and this is a very easy way to get it. The price is reasonable, especially because it is so easily digestible and causes no stomach upset whatsoever. Thank you for these Arazo Nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of DHA!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to know if this contains what it says. However, the amount of DHA is what I was looking for. After speaking with some medical researchers, they all seemed to agree that you should be taking at least 900mg of DHA Omega 3 per day for brain health. Most supplements fall well short of this. This one nails it and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pazzula

customer_reviews.title: Good source of Omega-3's
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have no reason to doubt this product's effectiveness though I haven't done any clinical tests to confirm any of that. I do however feel much better taking this product with the company's guarantee that it has been purity tested and SHOULD have positive effects on cardiovascular health. I will continue to keep using this product so long as the purity, safety, and content of said product all remains on the up-and-up. All in all, I would recommend this product to others looking for a good Omega 3 supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: No Fish Burps, No Fish Aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended fish oil because I had been suffering from dry eyes. I was reluctant to add fish oil to my supplement regimen because I had heard from my father about the yucky fish burps and aftertaste after he had started taking them. I bought this brand based on the claim it would not have those effects. This brand does what it claims, No Aftertaste, No Burps, and great results! Within a week my dry eyes were no longer. Bought my father a bottle and he loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: ghostrider44

customer_reviews.title: Best fish oil UPDATE: CAUTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: Will reccomend to friend, great taste and works well. Update: everyone should beware of their serving sizes, one serving is THREE softgels making one softgel only 750mg of omega 3 and not 2250 as they advertise! 2250 is in THREE SOFTGELS. Not very convenient to calculate your correct dosage since the mg is written per three capaules.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product. I have been having so many medical problems for YEARS. Headaches, general pain, severe eczema. My doctor recommended I start taking a high dose of quality Omega 3. So, I turned to amazon and found this product. I have been taking it for about 40 days now and ordered my next bottle! I went from having daily pain and headaches due to inflammation to absolutely NO headaches. And my extremely dry, cracked eczema skin is now on the mend! My hands and feet are no longer swollen and bleeding from all the scratching. My skin looks SO much better. I can not recommend this product enough!
customer_reviews.author: Lissa L.

customer_reviews.title: Reduced total cholesterol, triglycerides, LDL, and a1c in 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Been a diabetics for years, last lipid Chanel test came back last Sept. with 180 total Chol, 32 HDL, 255 triglycerides, LDL 113, starts to take fish oils with a few other supplements instead of adding another proscription to control cholesterol for 3 months, now the newer lipid test result came back on last Dec., total cholesterol is 152, triglycerides down to 138, LDL is 98, A1c also down from 7.7 to 6.8, can say which of the supplements worked to such a better result, but definitely will take fish oils again to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Jian Li

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down since product name change
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from bioscience nutrition and they were so good notice the difference taking them. But I order again this time from arazo nutrition and they are very different the label is less informative and the taste is horrible now. They smell like fish and you do burp fish. i will be emailing them some questions maybe the ingredients and process has change. See the pictures to see the now 2 different products.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa G.

customer_reviews.title: Key Qualities That I Seek
customer_reviews.text: Doctor told me to look for high EPA and DHA to help lower cholesterol, this product delivered just that. So glad I found this. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great price and comparable or better than the brand my Dr recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are big, and I have to drink a lot of water to get 3 down, which is pretty filling. I have to remember to take them before dinner or I don't want to slam all that water. That's my only complaint, and most omega 3 supplements are big, so no issue. My Dr recommended a brand here on Amazon, and when I looked it up it actually had lower levels than this brand, so I'll keep buying this. I have nothing bad to say and I'll keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Helps my joints
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this for aches and pains. It definitely helps. It is one of the highest values of Omega 3's I have found. It is burpless and easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Great value with High EPA and DHA
customer_reviews.text: This fish oil has high EPA and DHA compared to most other supplements I have compared it to. The capsules are large, but easy to swallow with water. It has no fishy burp smell, only a hint of lemon. I am giving this a high rating for now based on those aspects. The real review will be in a 6-8 weeks when I go back to my physician for my cholesterol labs. Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: MuleTrain

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: You will want to purchase this product if you are one that works out. I notice less inflammation and my joints feel better. I've been one to get stuff necks especially in the winter. I started taking fish oil and now I'm stiff neck free. Taste is great but what I look for in supplements is the quality. It has a high EPA & DHA - that's what you look for in fish oil. You will feel a difference if you have achy and stiff joints. Wonderful brand. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Suzuki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people who hate fish
customer_reviews.text: I decided to take this product because I really do not like fish. I know there are so many benefits to eating fish, and I keep trying it and wishing I liked it, and I keep not liking it. So, a good quality fish oil seemed to be a good substitute. They are big pills, but very easy to swallow and THEY DO NOT TASTE LIKE FISH. Hallelujah. I have not had one fishy burp from these either. There is no smell at all and it makes me so happy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Grunig

customer_reviews.title: Stuck so bad, hard as concrete
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I order it, the plastic bottle is fine. It's the pills inside that are junk. Says on there page that they might stick together, give them a shake. Haha. They are so stuck together, I slammed the bottle on the concrete outside. Broke the entire bottle apart and the pills are still stuck together. Total garbage product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brown

customer_reviews.title: Biggest pack of DHA on fish oil which is what the brain need
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, I enjoy taking the large dose of DHA as that is what makes me feel a little at ease during the day, as it helps inflammation from stress and the body after workouts. had no problems with fish oil sticking in the bottle and would continue to purchase as long as they keep the high quality they have preserved which is their integrity. a lot of companies try to obtain a number of customers and then they degrade the quality of the product. hopefully this doesn't happen here. great product!
customer_reviews.author: pira76

customer_reviews.title: Omega 3
customer_reviews.text: I LIKED THIS PRODUCT BECAUSE MY DOCTOR TOLD ME TO TAKE THIS OR SOME OTHER MEDICINE THAT WOULD MAKE MY BLOOD NOT FORM BLOOD CLOTS SO I CHOSE OMEGA 3 AND NOW I DON'T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT THAT FIRST OF ALL I WAS TAKING MEDICINE THAT I DID NOT KNOW THAT IT WOULD DO THAT TO MY BLOOD BECAUSE I HAVE KNEE ISSUES SO ISTOP TAKE THAT MEDICINE AND START TAKING OMEGA 3 TO BRING IT BACK THE WAY IT SUPPOSE TO BE WERE MY BLOOD WOULD NOT FORM CLOTS THANKS OMEGA 3.
customer_reviews.author: dianna davis-williams

customer_reviews.title: No fishy burps, great for breastfeeding.
customer_reviews.text: Great DHA/EPA ratio. I’ve been taking DHA since before getting pregnant as the Omegas help with baby’s brain development. After giving birth I started researching other brands always keeping quality in mind but wanting a more concentrated amount to pass it onto breastmilk. Well I guess it worked, after taking these for about two weeks (I take 1-2 daily) I notice my breastmilk is a bit fattier. Can’t tell 100% if this is why but I’ll keep in taking them. They are big but not hard to swallow, no flavor or aftertastes and definitely no fishy burps.
customer_reviews.author: Nai

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I am taking this 3 times a day to lower my total cholesterol and LDL. My levels were sky high a few months ago and doctors threatened to put me on a statin which I refused. I'm in shape, eat a clean diet and I work out a lot so the only thing I could think of doing to lower my levels was eating a lot more fiber and taking a very high strength fish oil. This product is what I chose and it has dropped my levels by 25% within a few months! It's been great for my health and it's a quality product. I don't have any side effects at all like others suggest
customer_reviews.author: HP3333

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I bought was good in terms of the color of tablets ( pure light yellow). The second bottle I ordered came with different sticker and the color of tables dark yellow. I feel it’s different product. I’m really disappointed. I’m going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no fish after taste
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd bottle of these. very impressed with my blood test. just went for my yearly physical and my numbers can back good. no cholesterol medication needed and my triglycerides was also normal. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Improved cognition immensely
customer_reviews.text: So far these are the best fish oil capsules I've tried. I take them at night before going to bed and in the morning I wake up clear headed, feeling refreshed, and in an overall better mood. My senses feel sharper. My short term memory works so much better, it's really a blessing I found these. They work
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT RECALLED BY FDA
customer_reviews.text: Still get burps with this “burpless” brand. No apparent health improvement; bowels smell like metal since using this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Less Joint  Pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who suffers with joint pain because he was a roofer for so long. This and turmeric have seem to help him with his joint pain and swelling. He says he can tell a difference if he is off of it for a few days. My husband hates to take pills, but he takes these because they make him feel so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rubright

customer_reviews.title: however I take one daily and at 80 I am still in excellent health and work at least 40 hours weeks in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how to rate this .... however I take one daily and at 80 I am still in excellent health and work at least 40 hours weeks in the field.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement, no fishy taste
customer_reviews.text: This particular brand was recommended to us by a friend. We tried it because it was cheaper than the brand we were usung and our friend swore you couldn’t taste it and was burpless. The capsules are large if you have problems swallowing, but we’ve both had a decrease in our cholesterol numbers. The capsules have never been stuck together when they arrived and I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strength, Value and Affordable fish oil!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nutrigold Triple Strength Fish oil when its price was half of what it is today. I liked Nutrigold as it provided really good fishoil at a great price. I don't think it is worth any more at its current price. Omega 3 Fishoil is similar to Nutrigold in strength at a half the cost. I don't feel the difference and I'd recommend this item to anyone looking for a high strength fish oil at affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Quality confirmed by independent labs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the quality that is confirmed by independent laboratories. No taste and filtration removes unwanted particles that occur naturally in fish. This results in a superior product that you can rely on and not be guessing at whether or not you are getting what you paid for. I am a pharmacist and believe this product is superior to many others.
customer_reviews.author: JACK PADGETT

customer_reviews.title: Only one-two a day works for me
customer_reviews.text: Order this product because my lab test showed I had normal Omegas 6 but low omegas 3. So I started to take this product on days I do not eat any foods high in omega 3 to even the amount of each. I'm still testing the product but so far I feel like is working with just 1 daily, or 1 twice daily with meals. Btw, I also have reflux and don't feel any disconfort with this product or after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Cholesterol 241 down to 142 in 4 months WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Well i am proud to say i have been taking this Omega 3 for 4 months. My cholesterol in August was at 271 mg/dL which is high risk and today Dec 20th I am at 142. And I havent really changed rhe way I eat. I am greatly impressed with my results Arazo has a customer for life as their product has saved mine. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: consumer1

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting fish oil softgels
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting fish oil. I have a hard time swallowing so I just let the softgel dissolve in my mouth. My doctor recommended to lower my cholesterol a bit. I will know in a couple of months if they work and I will update this review. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: George R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic company!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have a company like BioScience Nutrition that guarantees that you will be happy with their products and will do anything including sending a private e-mail to talk to you to make sure you are satisfied with doing business with them. They stand behind their products that much! Happy to try another product of theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover

customer_reviews.title: Worst of the worst. Hard as a rock and gives Terrible heartburn.
customer_reviews.text: There is a nothing good to say about these fish oil horse pills. My husband has been fish oil for years and our regular brand was not available so I bought these.. Not only are they hard as a rock and impossible to swallow he's been half the night with intense heartburn from them. Returning immediately and trying to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Banshee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good Inflammation reliever.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing oil. Certainly no fishy after taste. I take 1 after each meal (Breakfast, lunch, dinner). You should always eat these with some fat to get the most absorbation. Been few weeks now and my joints feel better so far. My neck pain has also subsided. I’m 37 and had a minor history of strained neck and back pain so this stuff is working. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Rickd21

customer_reviews.title: Great cardiovascular and brain product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these omega 3 supplements for over a year. I love them. NO fishy taste, easy to swallow. I just had my blood work done. My cholesterol is 189 with HDL at 41 and LDL at 110. My doctor loved it. He said just keep doing what you are doing. I am 63 years old and I take no medication other than a multi vitamin and these fish oil pills. Love the fact that the EPA is 1200mg. Most other store products are much less, My memory is wonderful. People are amazed at the details I remember from my past. I would recommend this product to anyone trying to improve their heart health and/or brain functions
customer_reviews.author: maddycat

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this fish oil for about a month and a half. My cholesterol levels are kind of high, so I figured I'd give it a try. It's too soon to know if it's lowering them, but I can say that it's easy to take. The gelcaps are pretty large, but they're easy to swallow, and there's no unpleasant taste. I just started my second bottle and am looking forward to my next screening this summer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It’s a big soft gel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a dietary supplement especially my father who avoids fish. Was surprised that it was big like the old fish oil - and too big for my elder father to take. Suggested use is three softgels with meals. He had trouble swallowing one soft gel - even with a light sip of water prior to swallowing. Both of us used another brand before - smaller and we don’t have to take 3 soft gels to meet suggested requirements. A very light smell of fish but not pungent or fishy in my opinion. Not buying it again. Maybe a picture in front of the bottle of the size of the soft gel may help buyers.
customer_reviews.author: A G V

customer_reviews.title: I liked it!
customer_reviews.text: I really really like these ultimate omega-3 supplements. I was a little hesitant to try them because I’ve had reactions before but I’ve had no reaction and I feel good on these. I’ve been taking them for months now. I take these for my heart although I have not been diagnosed with anything. I know it helps because I feel so much better and have more energy . They also help my joints.
customer_reviews.author: Ymer Aginuz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Supplement for Vegetarians
customer_reviews.text: I am a vegetarian and was searching for an Omega 3 supplement. My recent weight loss caused me to look sickly. After taking these supplements for two weeks, my face filled back out and I no longer look sickly. They're easy to swallow and I love the fact that they're GMP , which is what my doctor recommended for me. I'm extremely pleased! I just ordered my third bottle.
customer_reviews.author: MsOnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. I have bitten open the capsules and they were not rancid or fishy. Would have been 5 stars but the label is misleading as the serving size is 3 pills, which is a shady business practice. Also they are not burpless. If you take 3 on an empty stomach you will be burping and taste it. It's not bad though, because it taste liked oranges and mildly fishy. Fix your deceptive label.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Mclemore

customer_reviews.title: Dogs fur are smooth
customer_reviews.text: It's a little tricky at times getting them to swallow a pill a day. Esp. if they bite it, must not be tasty. However 4 dogs from 50lbs to 115 lbs all get one a day. Less than a week.their fur is smooth and my dobie feels silky. So using it for my dogs and it's worth it. Tried others and not the same.
customer_reviews.author: AJ is Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I believe that Omega 3 has significantly improved my health! This brand has the right nutritional make-up and is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: MoLo

customer_reviews.title: Life changing for me!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second bottle of this fish oil it's so great! There is no fishy taste or bad burps after taking them. I have struggled with depression and anxiety most of my life, sometimes both at the same time. After reading a book called "The Cure for Depression", I learned which supplements my brain was most likely lacking and omega 3's were at the top of the list. I can tell a night and day difference overall with my health after starting these gels. Are they huge? Yes. But are they worth it? Absolutely. I will never go without these!
customer_reviews.author: Allie T.

customer_reviews.title: High Potency at a Fantastic Price
customer_reviews.text: BioScience Nutrition has produced a superior product. This is the first fish oil that I have used that is not enteric coated. It was with some trepidation that I tried this product because of the unsatisfactory results with non-enteric coating. Unlike the prior experiences, the capsules did not break apart to early to cause a fishy taste or burps. This also appears to have the highest potency at an extremely reasonable price. This product is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Oxybeles

customer_reviews.title: YUCK! NOT for me! A WASTE of MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This has a minty flavor and causes you to burp a lot. This is NOT the best Fish Oil Supplement. You will have to take 3 GIANT gel caps a day which is NOT a bargain. I am going back to Mega Red! It is so much more superior to this. And these do NOT help with the Dry Eyes! Which is the major reason I take them!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to comment on how effective these are......
customer_reviews.text: I just know I don't get enough Omega 3s in my diet, naturally. These are quite large, so if you have esophageal problems as I do, be sure to swallow with a large gulp of liquid. The one time it got stuck in my throat, it dissolved fairly quickly and only a faint lemon flavor was detestable. So A+ for that!
customer_reviews.author: ThinkmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!!
customer_reviews.text: I found out I have an iron deficiency and I would recommend checking with your doctor before starting these. I got really sick while taking these. After I stopped taking them I went right back to feeling normal. Check with your doctor and if you don’t have one, try to get one. Seriously. I thought I was going to die.
customer_reviews.author: S. Summers

product_meta.title: Omega 3 Fish Oil 4,080MG - High EPA 1200MG + DHA 900MG Triple Strength Burpless Capsules - Arazo Nutrition (120 Count)
feature_bullets: ★ HIGH DOSE OF 4,080MG OMEGA 3 FISH OIL – Higher EPA and DHA levels than other brands with a total of 2,250MG Omega 3 Fatty Acid content
★ ULTRA PURE AND REFINED – Purified with molecular distillation at minimal temperatures to remove all heavy metals, mercury, PCB's and other toxins

★ 100% WILD OCEAN CATCH – From Fresh, Deep Sea Sourced, Omega-rich fish. Special extraction method for the highest volume of EPA and DHA. Sustainable and traceable – Triple certified by Marin Trust, Friend of the Seas and Dolphin Safe.

★ BURPLESS, NATURAL LEMON FLAVOR – Odorless & easy to swallow without fishy burps. How? Our fish oil concentrates are fresher than other brands – Proven by extremely low oxidation (TOTOX) values LESS THAN 5 meq/kg which is the highest quality in the market.

★ RELIABLE – Made in a GMP Certified Facility in America and HEAVY METAL TESTED for purity. We use a superior patented oil extraction method that results in extremely low levels of contaminants, oxidation and pollutants.
